010package imagingbook.common.threshold;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013
014/**
015 * Common interface to be implemented by all thresholders (global and adaptive).
016 * 
017 * @author WB
018 * @version 2022/08/02
019 *
020 */
021public interface Thresholder {
022        
023        /**
024         * Enum type to discriminate if the image background is assumed to be
025         * bright or dark.
026         */
027        public enum BackgroundMode {BRIGHT, DARK}
028                        
029        /**
030         * Thresholds the specified {@link ByteProcessor} (8-bit image),
031         * which is modified.
032         * Does nothing and returns {@code true} if no valid threshold could be found
033         * (e.g., if all image pixels have the same value).
034         * 
035         * @param ip a {@link ByteProcessor} (8-bit image)
036         * @return {@code true} iff the operation was successful
037         */
038        public boolean threshold(ByteProcessor ip);
039
040}
